posts.post_content: I can't expect more from a common. Beautiful art, relevant limited ability, and a nice 4/4 body for 3 under the right cir\*\*\*stances. You aren't going to play this in constructed, but then they weren't expecting you to.

posts.post_content: This reminds me of [Screeching Bat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Screeching Bat)/[Stalking Vampire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stalking Vampire) in that it's a vampire flip card with really nice flavor, but just can't compete with other 3 drop vampires. I wish they'd made them both a little smaller and had them cost 2.

3/5

posts.post_content:
My God. Innistrad and Dark Ascension are not letting up. I look at this and I find myself wishing a   
Champion of the Parish would break down the door and save the poor girl from the evil vampires.  
She's only willing because she thinks it's the only way to survive! She's lost faith in heroes! That's TERRIBLE!   
They're gonna KILL HER!!! :O :'(  
  
Innistrad is far too full of beautiful women in mortal peril. :p
